abstract: Silicon Valley leaders take a public stand against a ballot measure to ban same-sex marriage in California.
snippet: Silicon Valley leaders take a public stand against a ballot measure to ban same-sex marriage in California.
lead_paragraph: A group of prominent Silicon Valley executives and investors is publicly opposing Proposition 8, a California ballot measure that would amend the state constitution to eliminate the right of same-sex couples to marry. The group includes founders and current and former top executives of companies including Google, Yahoo, Adobe, eBay, Intuit, Cisco, Facebook and Palm.

headline.main: Silicon Valley Leaders Oppose Gay-Marriage Ban
